long_description: Offering exceptional 3-season backpacking and car-camping performance at an incredible value, The North Face Talus 2 Tent shelters 2 people in light, durable and convenient comfort. Fully seam-sealed canopy and floor help keep you snug and dry; high/low ventilation promotes breathability and helps control condensation. Exterior gear locker under the rainfly at the back of the tent keeps muddy and bulky gear outside, yet easily accessible. DAC Featherlite(R) NSL pole ends feature unique inserts that create strong, functional poles to save weight and reduce breakage. Poles and rainfly can be set up with the included ground tarp to create an even lighter weight shelter. The North Face Talus 3 Tent comes with a gear loft, ground tarp, guylines, stakes and stuff sacks.
short_description: Offering exceptional 3-season backpacking and car-camping performance at an incredible value, The North Face Talus 2 Tent shelters 2 people in light, durable and convenient comfort.
